verbose_text: Most recently, it was shown that microbial transglutaminase treated gluten peptides applied to cultured intestinal biopsies from patients with celiac disease induced a 15-fold increase in interferon-gamma release and 2.5-fold and 2.1-fold increases, respectively, in mean tissue transglutaminase antibody levels and endomysial antibody positivity.
evidence: microbial transglutaminase-treated gluten peptides applied to cultured intestinal biopsies from patients with celiac disease induced a 15-fold increase in interferon-gamma release and 2.5-fold and 2.1-fold increases, respectively, in mean tissue transglutaminase
